com.superduckinvaders.game.ai

Class PathfindingAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.ai.AI
      • com.superduckinvaders.game.ai.PathfindingAI

  • public class PathfindingAI
extends AI
    AI that follows and attacks the player within a certain range.
